title: Knowledge & Data
text:
Knowledge & Data - IFAD




























All Publications








 Theme 
Select







 Year 
Select







 Country 
Select











  Show more  





  

















Publication

 How to do note: The ecosystem approach to decent rural youth employment and entrepreneurship This practical guide provides actionable strategies to strengthen agribusiness ecosystems that support rural youth employment and entrepreneurship, enhance collaboration among governments, private sector actors and youth organizations, and scale innovative approaches that create decent wages and self-employment opportunities for rural youth. 

  Read now 
            
 
















Publication

 IFAD at a glance IFAD is the only multilateral development institution that focuses exclusively on investing in rural communities. 

  Read now 
            
 















Publication

 Photobook: Fostering change in people’s lives in Liberia This photobook showcases the positive impact of IFAD-supported projects on Liberia’s rural communities, including the Tree Crops Extension Projects (TCEP-I and II) and the Smallholder Agriculture Transformation and Agribusiness Revitalization Project (STAR-P). 

  Read now 
            
 

















Publication

 Photobook: Growing stronger rural futures in Türkiye This photobook showcases the impact of two projects in Türkiye that were financed by IFAD alongside the Government of Türkiye: the Uplands Rural Development Programme (URDP) and the Göksu Taşeli Watershed Development Project (GTWDP). 

  Read now 
            
 















Publication

 Sustainable and Resilient Agriculture in Malawi This brief provides an overview of the Investing in Livelihood Resilience and Soil Health in ACP Countries (ILSA) programme in Malawi, funded by the European Union and implemented by IFAD. 

  Read now 
            
 















Publication

 IFAD Project Procurement Annual Report 2024 The 2024 Project Procurement Annual Report provides a comprehensive overview of IFAD's project procurement activities throughout the year. 

  Read now 
            
 

















Publication

 Highlights from the Crisis Response Initiative in Eritrea This document highlights the main results of activities funded by IFAD’s Crisis Response Initiative (CRI) in Eritrea. 

  Read now 
            
 















Publication

 Investing in rural people in Guinea-Bissau This factsheet outlines IFAD’s work in Guinea-Bissau, including context, strategy and ongoing operations. 

  Read now 
            
 















Publication

 Investing in rural people in Yemen This factsheet outlines IFAD’s work in Yemen, including context, strategy and ongoing operations. 

  Read now

How to do note: The ecosystem approach to decent rural youth employment and entrepreneurship

This practical guide provides actionable strategies to strengthen agribusiness ecosystems that support rural youth employment and entrepreneurship, enhance collaboration among governments, private sector actors and youth organizations, and scale innovative approaches that create decent wages and self-employment opportunities for rural youth.

 How to do note: The ecosystem approach to decent rural youth employment and entrepreneurship This practical guide provides actionable strategies to strengthen agribusiness ecosystems that support rural youth employment and entrepreneurship, enhance collaboration among governments, private sector actors and youth organizations, and scale innovative approaches that create decent wages and self-employment opportunities for rural youth. Publication

 How to do note: The ecosystem approach to decent rural youth employment and entrepreneurship This practical guide provides actionable strategies to strengthen agribusiness ecosystems that support rural youth employment and entrepreneurship, enhance collaboration among governments, private sector actors and youth organizations, and scale innovative approaches that create decent wages and self-employment opportunities for rural youth. Read now 
            
 

















Publication

 Photobook: Growing stronger rural futures in Türkiye This photobook showcases the impact of two projects in Türkiye that were financed by IFAD alongside the Government of Türkiye: the Uplands Rural Development Programme (URDP) and the Göksu Taşeli Watershed Development Project (GTWDP). 154
